title: DynaConnections Corporations
headline: Software QA Engineer
searchDescription: Quality assurance ninja ensuring bulletproof software solutions at DynaConnections, where attention to detail meets cutting-edge development practices
longDescription:
• Design and execute comprehensive test strategies including manual and automated testing protocols, API testing, user interface validation, and performance testing to ensure compliance with industry standards
• Achieved 40% improvement in overall product reliability and 60% reduction in post-deployment bugs through implementing quality assurance best practices and establishing testing frameworks that catch edge cases early
• Collaborate closely with cross-functional development teams to identify and resolve issues before they become expensive problems, embedding quality mindset throughout entire development process
• Developed expertise in creating detailed test cases, performing regression testing, and analytical problem-solving that provides deep insights into software development lifecycle and ensures highest standards of user experience

title: Cita Marketplace
headline: Machine Learning Engineer - Intern
searchDescription: Revolutionizing the restaurant industry through AI-powered reservation trading platform, developing intelligent algorithms to optimize dining experiences and restaurant capacity management
longDescription:
• Built intelligent machine learning algorithms using Python, TensorFlow, and scikit-learn for dynamic pricing optimization, demand prediction, and recommendation systems that transformed restaurant reservation marketplace into efficient trading platform
• Achieved 42% increase in successful reservation matches and 35% improvement in platform revenue per transaction through predictive models analyzing historical booking patterns, restaurant popularity trends, and real-time demand signals
• Contributed to React Native mobile application development ensuring seamless integration of recommendation engine with user experience, supporting marketplace for exclusive restaurant reservations across major metropolitan areas
• Created data-driven pitch presentations that secured partnerships with 20+ high-end restaurants, demonstrating how machine learning can disrupt traditional industries and benefit both diners and restaurant owners

title: Akomapa Health
headline: Software Engineer
searchDescription: Leading technical operations for student-driven health organization in southern Ghana, managing website infrastructure and developing engagement strategies to amplify health education impact
longDescription:
• Manage complete website workflow including server maintenance, database optimization, and feature implementation that supports 15,000+ active student users monthly with 99.8% uptime reliability for health education platform
• Developed automated content delivery systems and mobile-first design improvements that increased user engagement by 65% and boosted mobile traffic by 80%, making health information more accessible to student communities
• Engineered social media integration tools and analytics dashboards that resulted in 200% increase in cross-platform engagement, reaching students across 25+ educational institutions in southern Ghana
• Built interactive community platform enabling students to access peer-reviewed health content, participate in wellness challenges, and connect with certified health professionals, demonstrating how technology amplifies grassroots health advocacy movements
